docstring.text: Represents a file to send as an attachment.

returns.description: The filename of the file. If not set, path or object_id of the IO is used.
The content type of the file. If not set, it is guessed from the filename.

docstring.text: Creates a new file from IO.

params.name: filename
params.description: The filename of the file. If not set, path or object_id of the IO is used.

params.name: content_type
params.description:
The content type of the file. If not set, it is guessed from the filename.
If failed to guess, it is set to `application/octet-stream`.

docstring.text: Creates a new file from a string.

params.name: string
params.description: The string to create the file from.

params.name: filename
params.description: The filename of the file. object_id of the string is used if not set.

params.name: content_type
params.description: The content type of the file. If not set, it is guessed from the filename.
